review: This is the best streaming dongle out there. The use of your phone allows you with more functionality and you can cast you entire screen using lolipop. You can use the USB port on the side of the TV or it comes with a long enough cable to use the an outlet if that works better for you. You can easily control the volume from your phone to quickly change the volume and you can still use your phone for anything you want while casting something. The only thing this is lacking is support for Amazon Prime Instant Video. That is the only benefit that the Fire TV has over this. There is no learning curve to this because it is just like using your phone.
